message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business. Given its worth to you, I propose an initial offer of $950,000 for the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of this product, $950,000 is a bit steep for me at this time. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it. This would still be a good deal for you, and it's the highest I can go right now.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I am proposing a revised offer of $975,000 for the product. This is my best offer at this time, and I believe it strikes a balance between our interests.
